Module it.polimi.ingsw.PSP18

Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP18.server.controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BackupManager
    class that deals with the backup side of the game, once a player disconnects and reconnects
    DirectionManagement
    Class the implements some utility methods useful for TurnManager and divinity classes
    MatchManager
    Manages the multiple matches running into the server
    MatchRun
    class that deals with all the request of the game map, workers, turn manager, and the backUp file name
    MatchSetUp
    class that deals with all the set up methods used before the actual match start like: checking for the players ready status and the divinities chosen,
    MatchSocket
    class that contains all information about the players in the match, their sockets and also all the methods to manage them
    PlayerManager
    class that deals with the layer information such as divinity and turns
    TurnManager
    class that articulates the players' turns
    TurnManagerAthena
    class that articulates the players' turns when Athena is in the game
